Yekusimbisa link itsva yatumirwa kuemail yako.

Click here to re-send the verification e: Dzvanya apa kuti utumire zvakare email yekuongorora.
Delete your account and all of its resou: Delete account yako uye zvese zvezvinhu zvayo
Each recovery code can be used once to a: Imwe neimwe kodhi yekudzoreredza inogona kushandiswa kamwe chete kuwana account yako uye ichabviswa mushure mekushandiswa. Kana iwe uchida zvimwe, tinya maneja makodhi pamusoro.
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Simbisa kuti account yako iri kushandisa nguva yakareba, yakasarudzika kuti ugare wakachengeteka
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Isa iyo 6-manhamba kodhi kubva kune yako yechokwadi app.
Enter the authentication code provided b: Isa iyo yekodhi yekodhi yakapihwa neyako egalenticator application.
Enter your details below to create your: Isa yako nhoroondo pazasi kuti ugadzire yako account
Enter your email and password below to l: Isa yako email uye password pazasi kuti ipinde mukati
Enter your email to receive a password r: Isa yako email kuti ugamuchire password reset link
Manage your profile and account settings: Tonga yako nhoroondo uye account account

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Kamwe account yako kana yakabviswa, zvese zvayo zviwanikwa uye data zvichaderedzwa zvachose. Ndokumbira usimbise kuti iwe ungade kudzima zvachose account yako.
Kana account yako yadzimwa, zvese zviwanikwa zvayo uye data zvichabviswa zvachose. Ndokumbira uise password yako kuratidza kuti unoda kudzima zvachose account yako.
Please confirm access to your account by: Ndokumbira usimbise mukana wekuwana account yako nekupinda imwe yenzvimbo yako yekukurumidzira yekudzora.
Please enter your new password below: Ndokumbira utore password yako nyowani pazasi
Please verify your email address by clic: Ndokumbira utarise yako email kero nekudzvanya pane iyo link yatoratidza kwauri iwe.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Kudzoreredza macode kunokura iwe zvakare kuwana kana iwe ukarasikirwa neyako 2fa mudziyo. Chengetedze mune yakachengetedzwa password password.
This is a secure area of the application: Iyi inzvimbo yakachengetedzeka yekushandisa. Ndokumbira usimbise password yako usati waenderera.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: Kuti upedze kutadzisa maviri-factor kusimbiswa, svaga iyo QR kodhi kana kuisa iyo setup kiyi mune yako yechokwadi app.
Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Maviri-factor kusimbiswa kwave kugoneswa. Tarisa iyo QR kodhi kana isa iyo Setup kiyi mune yako yechokwadi app.
Update your name and email address: Gadziridza zita rako uye email kero
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: Paunogonesa maviri-factor kusimbiswa, iwe uchave unokurudzirwa pini yakachengeteka panguva yekupinda. Iyi pini inogona kudzoserwa kubva kuThe TOTP-inotsigirwa application pafoni yako.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Nezvimwe-zviviri-chinhu chisarudzo chakaita kuti iwe ugone, iwe unozokurudzirwa kune yakachengeteka, isina kujairika pini panguva yekupinda, iyo iwe yaunogona kutora kubva kuThe TOTP-inotsigirwa application pafoni yako.
